metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Le Perv has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
